description: Explore how Opulus and NFTs are revolutionizing the music industry by leveraging blockchain technology to redefine music rights and royalties, empowering artists and enhancing fan engagement.
keywords: NFTs, Opulus, music industry, blockchain technology, music rights, royalties, artist empowerment, fan engagement, decentralized finance, digital assets
title: The NFT Revolution: How Opulus is Transforming the Music Industry
